title: very racist troll in my game admits to doing this on multiple accounts
body:
Dear Riot,
Please check this guy, and along with this evidence, ban him for racist and very toxic behavior such as constantly telling me to kill myself and calling me racial slurs, while also feeding. Please check the game he just played riot, very racist and toxic all around...

he went like 0-13 or something as well

<removed by moderation>

replies.body:
I removed your images. As Imperial Pandaa notes, they violated the no name and shame rule. 

If you have questions about this, feel free to reach out to us on the moderation discord.

Edit: I didn't delete this so that I could say this: even though they *say* they've been doing that, it doesn't mean that's true. They've already shown you they're toxic; clearly they don't mind adding in other lines just to further that. As is clear on the boards, people get punished for this type of behavior pretty frequently.
Go do a support ticket then. The boards can't help you. Additionally there is a no name and shame rule.

''Report is 4 kids''
